# Copilot instructions

This file contains instructions for GitHub Copilot usage in this repository.

- Use Copilot to suggest C# code that follows .NET best practices.
- Prioritize readability, maintainability, and SOLID principles.
- Add XML doc comments for public APIs and include unit tests for new logic.
- Run linters and formatters on all code before committing.
- Keep lines under 80 characters in YAML and markdown files.
